mapper.select: SELECT bsrc.id, bsrc.bmi_min, bsrc.bmi_max, bsrc.sick_risk_id, bsrc.rout FROM bmi_sick_risk_config bsrc WHERE bsrc.sick_risk_id=${sick_risk_id} ORDER by bsrc.id DESC

SELECT bsrc.id, bsrc.bmi_min, bsrc.bmi_max, bsrc.sick_risk_id, bsrc.rout FROM bmi_sick_risk_config bsrc WHERE bsrc.bmi_min <= ${bmi} AND bsrc.bmi_max >= ${bmi} AND bsrc.sick_risk_id = ${sick_risk_id} ORDER BY bsrc.id DESC
